org.openimaj.data

Class AbstractDataSource<DATATYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.data.AbstractDataSource<DATATYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    DATATYPE - the data type which can be returned
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<DATATYPE>, DataSource<DATATYPE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractMultiListDataSource, IndexedViewDataSource

    public abstract class AbstractDataSource<DATATYPE>
extends Object
implements DataSource<DATATYPE>
    Abstract base class for DataSource implementations. Simplifies implementation by providing iterator() and getRandomRows(Object[]) methods that proxy their work to DataSource.getData(int).
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
